value.title: Computing totals by summing visible values in DAX
value.excerpt: This video shows how to compute a measure that sums the values produced row by row in the visual into the visual total, instead of recomputing the total value in the filter context of the total. Article and download: https://sql.bi/89870

value.title: Filter top 3 products with a row for others using DAX in Power BI
value.excerpt: This video shows an optimized DAX technique to display the first N products for each category in Power BI, adding a row that aggregates the value for all the other products. Article and download: https://sql.bi/695263/?aff=yt  The article includes further insights and optimization solutions, whereas

value.title: Lookup multiple values in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn different advanced techniques to retrieve multiple values from a lookup table in DAX, improving code readability and performance in DAX queries. Article and download: https://sql.bi/43801?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Create맗aginated reports먝
value.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Scope report design requirements
value.excerpt: Gathering appropriate inputs to scope your report design requirements involves identifying your audience, determining the suitable report types, and defining their interface and experience requirements. This module provides you with a strong foundation on which to learn how to plan your report design requirements.

value.title: Use visuals in Power BI
value.excerpt: Create and customize visuals to present data in compelling and insightful ways.

value.title: A technique to count anything in Power Query and some in DAX too
value.excerpt: In todays video I will show you a technique to count any text in a cell in Power query and DAX. value.title: Avoid refresh errors when importing files in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns?
